Articles.Content: Hello im new to the forums but have been playing KSP for awhile, i dont use mods other than chatterer. Although i just downloaded Biomass mod for my ship(and cant get it to work correctly, i have all the attachments) but the biomass doesnt increase(i know face it toward the sun) and when i use the bioreactor i lose biomass but i have no clue what it is converting it into. any help would be appreciated. that being said this is the ship named the "Ralph Kramden" (Pow straight to the moon) . it is not completely done. i wanted to put 2 landers on it and 2 biomass converters. It took 14 trips to assemble, i dont use lights on it due to the fact when you get within 2.3 km it starts getting choppy which made it alot harder to dock.
Sorry, no help on the biomass stuff. Just wanted to say that's a great looking ship, and love the name! Hopefully I'm not the only other person to get the reference.
ha, thanks, id like to get some help on the biomass thing so i can finish him...launching the landers as we speak

Head over to a biomass thread and ask for help there?

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/62631-BioMass-Ongoing-Development
